headline: Nucor rides ‘tsunami of earnings power,’ citing data center buildouts
summary: The company also saw import declines driven by Section 232 tariffs, which were offset by a domestic surge in steel mill shipments.

headline: A Look at Nucor’s (NUE) Valuation Following a Strong Q3 Earnings Beat and Softer Outlook
summary: Nucor (NUE) surprised the market with its third-quarter earnings, topping revenue and profit forecasts while posting net income that more than doubled from a year ago. Investors responded with cautious optimism. See our latest analysis for Nucor. Following the upbeat earnings and an ongoing buyback, Nucor’s stock has gained momentum, with a 1-day share price return of 5.4% and a 7-day return of 8.2%. Over the past year, the total shareholder return sits modestly at 5.1%. Long-term holders...

headline: Nucor (NUE) Margin Slump Challenges Recovery Narratives Despite Bullish Earnings Outlook
summary: Nucor (NUE) posted a net profit margin of 5.2%, falling short of last year’s 7.9%, as earnings continued a five-year decline at an average rate of 7.6% per year. Although revenue is forecast to climb 5.7% annually, trailing the broader US market’s projected 10.1% growth, analysts see Nucor’s earnings bouncing back strongly with a 26% growth rate expected over the next three years, well above the US market's 15.6% outlook. At the same time, Nucor trades at a compelling 21.2x price-to-earnings...
